name: Senseless Chaos Protocol
description:
This game was made for the Nord-MÁ-Namdals Halloween Game Jam hosted by InDevelopment.

An outbreak has happened, and SCP's are roaming the place. Do you have what it takes to take care of it? Take use of the SCP index ingame for clues on what you need to hunt.

Made by: Bastian Engø, Aedan Soellaart and Domantas Martinaitis.
